jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.place: Presidencia de la República Dominicana; Programa Supérate
jobs.todo: Responsible for the development of web applications written with web technologies: Asp.Net mvc5 / .net Core, jQuery and Angular using design patterns such as MVC and MVVM. I develop modules and new functions for the systems used in this institution.
duties: Develop the necessary analysis and programs to improve, complete or expand existing systems, according to user needs.
Responsible for developing and maintaining the institution's web applications.
Pipelines settings in Azure DevOps Server (On Premise) for CI / CD.

jobs.title: Ionic Developer
jobs.todo: I developed an application with Ionic 2, angular and its backend in PHP called Workbefy; it offers a list of services in which people who are registered can request to workers that are available on the App.
duties: Responsible for developing the mobile application with Ionic 2
Responsible for developing the REST with PHP
